entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
